tests.id: Optional. ID of the test. Must be unique. Generated UUID if not specified.
tests.file: Output only. File the test is defined in. All actions for a given test must be defined in a single file.
tests.status: Output only. The status of the test based on test action results. Possible values: PASS, WARNING, FAIL

actions.action: Required. Task to perform. Supported values: goTo, find, matchText, click, type, wait, screenshot
actions.css: Required for the following actions: find, matchText, click, type. CSS selectors that resolve to the element. Only returns the first element that matches the selectors.
actions.directory: Optional. Applicable to the following actions: screenshot. The directory path for media created by the action. Overrides the default directory config. Default is config.imageDirectory or config.videoDirectory depending on the file type.
actions.duration: Optional. Applicable to the following actions: wait. How long to wait in milliseconds.
actions.filename: Optional. Applicable to the following actions: screenshot. Name of the media file. If not specified, the filename is randomized.
actions.keys: Optional. Applicable to the following actions: type. Strings of keys of enter. To send special keys like 'ENTER', see 'trailingSpecialKey'.
actions.line: Output only. Line number that the test action definition begins on.
actions.testId: Optional. Input only. Only valid for non-JSON test files. ID of the test the action belongs to.
actions.text: Required. Applicable to the following actions: matchText. Exact text expected to display in the element.
actions.trailingSpecialKey: Optional. Applicable to the following actions: type. A special key pressed after the 'keys' value, if present. Supported values: https://github.com/puppeteer/puppeteer/blob/main/src/common/USKeyboardLayout.ts
actions.uri: Required. Applicable to the following actions: goTo. URI to navigate to in the browser.

result.status: Output only. Status based on test action results. Possible values: PASS, WARNING, FAIL
result.description: Output only. Explaination of the action result.
result.image: Output only. File path for an output image.
result.video: Output only. File path for an output video.
